import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
df=pd.DataFrame({
                    "제품":["사과",'딸기','수박'],
                    "가격":[1800,1500,3000],
                    "판매량":[24,38,13]
})

sum(df["가격"])/3
np.mean(df["판매량"])

np.float64(25.0)

title: hw1
text:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
df=pd.DataFrame({
                    "제품":["사과",'딸기','수박'],
                    "가격":[1800,1500,3000],
                    "판매량":[24,38,13]
})

sum(df["가격"])/3
np.mean(df["판매량"])

np.float64(25.0)
